name: Gacha Fever
description:
Who do you call when the city is attacked by monsters ?
Right, the Gacha Fighters !

In this bullet heaven survivor, pull your character from your gacha machine, and destroy your enemies with cuteness ♡

Craft and Loot !

Keychains ? No ! They are weapons ! Collect and upgrade them to see what they do.
Choose your weapons carefully, from the machine gun, to the magic wand and not the Buble-Canon

Choose your items wisely to maximize your statistics. Collecter les Bubble Teas ! Mochis !
Fuse items to have more powerful ones !



When you're not surviving, you're decorating your sticker book with all the success you won during missions !

So, are you ready to get the Gacha Fever ? Just be careful of the area !



In this surviving vampire like, we want to give the player the opportunity to choose their path, their end-of-run boss.
A simple crafting system to slightly complicate the genre.

We are working on a post jam version of Gacha Fever and we plan to release the game in 2024 on Steam
You can test the game jam version if you want and give us feedback
This is a game made during Ludum Dare 54, we loved working on this game we decided to go further :)

CONTROLS



Nothing’s easier ! Armed with your computer keyboard and mouse, all you’d have to do is using the directional pad to move from one way to another during the stage and pick the items you like by clicking on it after each fight !


https://discord.gg/U6RTzBbYbZ

Features

- Lots of kawaii heroes to obtain who will give you different runs !
- Fast runs (under 25 minutes)
- Auto-firing weapons by default with a manual aiming option
- Lots and lots of weapons with different effects !
- A Craft system linked to item loot !
- Between each wave of enemies you can buy weapons, loot and craft !
